notes: Unit tests use Jest framework with JavaScript (.spec.js)
Integration tests use Cucumber (BDD) with Gherkin feature files
E2E tests run in external pipeline (verifiedfan/e2e-tests/pipelines)
Tests run in CI at multiple stages (pre-bundle, per-environment)
No coverage tracking configured in CI or locally
Tests are co-located with source code in shared/ directory
Mock data flag used in integration tests: SHOULD_MOCK_TEST_DATA=true
